Name: Carrier Trail
About the game: Deliver a package to the royal family and live to tell the tale! Carrier Trail is an indie, adventure game developed by CrackedGhostGames and inspired by the 1985 game, Oregon Trail. INFINITE REPLAYABILITY Each time you play Carrier Trail will be a fresh new adventure! All the events in-game are chosen at random and can branch in multiple different ways! Each time you play, you never get the same game twice! THOUSANDS OF EXPERIENCES You read that right, THOUSANDS OF EXPERIENCES! MADNESS! Each event has multiple endings, branches, and choices for you to make to add even MORE randomness and replayability to each run! Know a certain event gives you gold? Think again! Maybe you'll get something different next time! BEAUTIFUL GAMEBOY INSPIRED PIXEL ART A massive, hand-drawn overworld 8,176 pixels wide! Each pixel placed in a specific area to create a minimalistic yet beautiful overworld for you to admire as you go about your journey. WHAT DOES CARRIER TRAIL HAVE TO OFFER? A freakin' massive overworld! HUNDREDS of choose-your-own-adventure style events! THOUSANDS of experiences! Infinite replayability! It will easily provide you with hours of entertainment! A catchy soundtrack that forces you to hum at work! Lots o' laughs! Work for sketchy folk or honest hard working citizens! Boss fights! Amazing events crafted by some incredible DMs! Rabid cacti ambushes! What are you waiting for?! The king is waiting for you!
